text: "Yester-Me, Yester-You, Yesterday" is a 1969 song by Stevie Wonder. It was taken from his album My Cherie Amour. It went to number 7 in the United States and Belgium, number 10 in New Zealand and Canada, number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in Ireland, number 1 in Norway, number 18 in Spain and number 14 in South Africa. == References == Category:1969 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs
title: Yester-Me, Yester-You, Yesterday
